means: （原为骑兵用的）卡宾枪，轻型半自动或自动步枪

sentence.Network_en: His carbine cracked when the infuriated elephant bore down on the hunters.
sentence.Network_cn: 被激怒的象向猎人们冲过去时,他的冲锋枪打响了.

sentence.Network_en: Dalleson said it while he slipped the magazine out of the carbine.
sentence.Network_cn: 达尔生一边说,一边卸下枪上的弹仓.

sentence.Network_en: The crack of Dalleson's carbine sounded again.
sentence.Network_cn: 达尔生的卡宾枪又砰地响了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...在前线配了这样的枪，有木抢托还有折叠抢托．后来由于卡宾枪（Carbine）轻巧，使用方便等优点，被部分特种部队使用,M4卡宾 …
龙骑兵主要用的是马枪(carbine)，有人译作卡宾枪，只是步兵用卡宾枪英文名称carabine，龙骑兵用的carbine要少一个a，大概是枪管 …

list.abs: the US Army uses two distinct families of weapons in5.56 x45 mm calibre : the M16 rifle and the derivative M4 carbine form one group , the M249 Squad Automatic Weapon the other .美国陆军使用两种截然不同的5.56毫米口径枪族：一种是M16步枪以及其派生出来的M4卡宾枪，另一种是M249班用机枪。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from French carabine, from carabin 'mounted musketeer', of unknown origin

entry.def: A carbine is a light automatic rifle.

auth_sentence.content: Knight was arrested on Tuesday and charged with stealing an AR-15 carbine from a Fuquay-Varina gun store where he worked.
auth_sentence.res_content: Knight was arrested on Tuesday and charged with stealing an AR-15 carbine from a Fuquay-Varina gun store where he worked.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Knight was arrested on Tuesday and charged with stealing an AR-15 carbine from a Fuquay-Varina gun store where he worked.
